Module ShingShang
Package abstraction

Class Board

java.lang.Object
abstraction.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the board.
Author:
Tanguy Mossion

  • Field Summary

    Cell[][] board
    The board of the game, it's a two dimension tab of Cell

    Board()
